00121 
00122 class WCS_T
00123 {
00124 protected:
00125         WCS_Configure *mp_Conf;
00126         vector<DatasetObject> mv_datasetCoverage;
00127         vector<StitchedMosaicObject> mv_stitchedMosaicCoverage;
00128         vector<DatasetSeriesObject> mv_datasetSeriesCoverage;
00129 
00130         string  ms_datasetConfPath;
00131         string  ms_stitchedMosaicConfPath;
00132         string  ms_datasetSeriesConfPath;
00133         string  ms_iso19115Contents;
00134         string  ms_eoMetadataContents;
00135         string  ms_requestFullURL;
00136 
00137 public:
00138         int     mb_SoapRequest;
00139         string  ms_Service_op_URL;
00140         vector<string> mvs_SupportFormats;
00141 
00142 public:
00143         WCS_T();
00144         WCS_T(const string& conf);
00145         virtual ~WCS_T();
00146 
00147         CPLErr InitializeConfigurationFiles();
00148         DatasetSeriesObject InitializeDatasetSeriesByID(string& sCovID);
00149         DatasetObject InitializeDatasetByID(string& sCovID);
00150 
00151         void SetSoapMessage(const int& soapMsg)
00152         {
00153                 mb_SoapRequest = soapMsg;
00154         }
00155 
00156         int IsSoapRequested()
00157         {
00158                 return mb_SoapRequest;
00159         }
00160 
00161         void SendHttpHead();
00162 
00163         virtual CPLErr GetReqMessageFromXMLTree(CPLXMLNode *xmlRoot)
00164         {
00165                 return CE_Failure;
00166         }
00167 
00168         virtual CPLErr GetReqMessageFromURLString(const string&)
00169         {
00170                 return CE_Failure;
00171         }
00172 
00173         virtual void WCST_Respond(string& sOutFileName)
00174         {
00175                 return;
00176         }
00177 
00178         virtual void WCST_Respond()
00179         {
00180                 return;
00181         }
00182 
00183 };
